sqlMap.select: SELECT A.YEAR, A.EVAL_DEGREE_ID, A.SC_DEPT_ID, B.SC_DEPT_NM, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CBE_EVAL_MASTER E WHERE A.YEAR=E.YEAR AND A.EVAL_DEGREE_ID = E.EVAL_DEGREE_ID AND A.SC_DEPT_ID=E.SC_DEPT_ID) USER_CNT, A.EXCE_EVAL_REASON FROM CBE_EXCE_EVAL_DEPT A LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_SC_DEPT B ON A.YEAR=B.YEAR AND A.SC_DEPT_ID=B.SC_DEPT_ID WHERE A.YEAR=#findYear# AND A.EVAL_DEGREE_ID=#findEvalDegreeId#
SELECT YEAR, EVAL_DEGREE_ID, EVAL_DEGREE_NM FROM BSC_ECM_EVAL_DEGREE WHERE YEAR=#findYear#
SELECT YEAR , EVAL_DEGREE_ID , EVAL_DEGREE_NM FROM BSC_ECM_EVAL_DEGREE WHERE YEAR = #year# AND EVAL_DEGREE_ID = #evalDegreeId#

SELECT A.YEAR , A.EVAL_DEGREE_ID , A.SC_DEPT_ID , B.SC_DEPT_NM , A.EXCE_EVAL_REASON FROM CBE_EXCE_EVAL_DEPT A LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_SC_DEPT B ON A.YEAR=B.YEAR AND A.SC_DEPT_ID=B.SC_DEPT_ID WHERE A.YEAR = #year# AND A.EVAL_DEGREE_ID = #evalDegreeId# AND A.SC_DEPT_ID = #scDeptId#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO CBE_EXCE_EVAL_DEPT ( YEAR , EVAL_DEGREE_ID , SC_DEPT_ID , EXCE_EVAL_REASON , CREATE_DT ) VALUES ( #year# , #evalDegreeId# , #scDeptId# , #exceEvalReason# , SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE CBE_EXCE_EVAL_DEPT SET EXCE_EVAL_REASON = #exceEvalReason# , MODIFY_DT = SYSDATE WHERE YEAR = #year# AND EVAL_DEGREE_ID = #evalDegreeId# AND SC_DEPT_ID = #scDeptId#
DELETE FROM CBE_EXCE_EVAL_DEPT WHERE YEAR = #year# AND EVAL_DEGREE_ID = #evalDegreeId# AND SC_DEPT_ID = #scDeptId#
